roleset.name: (cause to) be located
roleset.note: SITUATE-V NOTES: Member of VNcls put-9.1. (from situate.01-v)

example.name: sorta verbal
example.text: Presidio said [the properties]-1 are generally situated *trace*-1 in Wyoming, North Dakota, Texas, Oklahoma and Louisiana.
example.arg: in Wyoming, North Dakota, Texas, Oklahoma and Louisiana

example.name: active, all args
example.text: Humans became the focus of his attention, and he situated them in helplessness situations, where their lives are endangered without a chance of rescue.
example.arg: in helplessness situations, where their lives are endangered without a chance of rescue
